Bytes of Michael Bishop

A personal web log

Internet Home of Michael Bishop

I've thought long and hard on how I want to make websites for me. This is where I've landed. Eleventy as a static site generator and PostCSS for styling development. I am borrowing heavily from work I've previously done with Jekyll-IndieWeb.

This will not be a framework or a project I maintain for general use. I do encourage you to dig through the code and take any bits that might be useful. If you find a bug or have a question about a piece of code, feel free to open an issue.

Reference:

Eleventy

PostCSS

Jekyll IndieWeb

Eleventy Base Blog

Smix Eleventy Starter

Last.fm Listening Page

Built on IndieWeb principles
